title: 台北舊巷弄旗袍美女
zh: 【超寫實攝影傑作】描繪一位甜美的年輕女性，擁有精緻的五官，留著黑色長直髮與空氣瀏海。身形呈現身材纖細，上圍豐滿具有份量感，腰身極細，雙腿修長。皮膚細節：白皙如瓷的膚色，可見精細的毛孔與真實的汗珠，具有皮膚透光感。她佩戴著極簡的珍珠項鍊與金色耳環，穿著一件精緻的刺繡絲綢旗袍，設計有高開衩展現腿部線條。場景設定在在台北的舊巷弄中，午後陽光穿過電線桿，充滿懷舊氛圍。光影效果：夜市的霓虹背景散景，採用青橙色的電影級調色。拍攝規格：採用 Arri Alexa 電影規格攝影機，搭配 85mm 蔡司大師定焦鏡拍攝。畫面特點：細膩髮絲、眼神對焦銳利、真實陰影與高動態範圍。
en: Generate a hyper-realistic 8K cinematic masterpiece photography of a sweet young woman with delicate features, obsidian straight hair, wispy bangs. Her physique is slender build, prominent full bust (沉重感), narrow waist, long legs. Skin texture: porcelain fair skin, hyper-detailed pores, realistic sweat drops, subsurface scattering. She is wearing minimalist pearl necklace, gold earrings, dressed in exquisite embroidered silk cheongsam (Qipao), high slit. The setting is Taipei old alley, afternoon sun, utility poles, nostalgic. Lighting: Night market neon bokeh, teal and orange cinematic grade. Shot with Arri Alexa 65, 85mm Zeiss Master Prime, f/1.4. Features: Individual hair strands, sharp focus on eyes, contact shadows, perfect anatomy, high dynamic range, raw photo style.

title: 超現實雨中巴黎公寓肖像
zh: 【超寫實攝影傑作】描繪一位甜美的年輕女性，擁有精緻的五官，留著黑色長直髮與空氣瀏海。身形呈現身材纖細，上圍豐滿具有份量感，腰身極細，雙腿修長。皮膚細節：白皙如瓷的膚色，可見精細的毛孔與真實的汗珠，具有皮膚透光感。她佩戴著極簡的珍珠項鍊與金色耳環，穿著一件白色針織露背毛衣，剪裁大膽且展現身體曲線。場景設定在在巴黎復古公寓的落地窗邊，窗外正下著雨。光影效果：一道道耶穌光(丁達爾效應)，空氣中有微塵飄浮，正是金黃時段。拍攝規格：採用 Arri Alexa 電影規格攝影機，搭配 85mm 蔡司大師定焦鏡拍攝。畫面特點：細膩髮絲、眼神對焦銳利、真實陰影與高動態範圍。
en: [A Hyperrealistic Masterpiece] This photograph depicts a sweet young woman with delicate features, long, straight black hair, and wispy bangs. Her figure is slender, with a full, voluptuous bust, an extremely narrow waist, and long, shapely legs. Skin details: Porcelain-white skin with visible fine pores and realistic beads of sweat, giving it a translucent quality. She wears a minimalist pearl necklace and gold earrings, and a white, backless knit sweater with a bold cut that accentuates her curves. The scene is set by the floor-to-ceiling windows of a vintage Parisian apartment, with rain falling outside. Lighting effects: Rays of light (Tyndall effect), with dust particles floating in the air, all during the golden hour. Shooting specifications: An Arri Alexa cinematic camera with an 85mm Zeiss master lens. Image characteristics: Detailed hair, sharp focus on the eyes, realistic shadows, and high dynamic range.

title: 身著蕾絲內衣的優雅女子
zh:
GeneGenerate 是一張超逼真的 8K 電影級攝影作品，展現了優雅女性迷人的風采。她擁有精緻的橢圓形臉龐、深邃神秘的眼神和珊瑚色的嘴唇。她身材纖細苗條，胸部豐滿，腰肢纖細，雙腿修長。肌膚質感：水潤透亮，水珠閃爍，呈現水光質感。她穿著一套時尚的蕾絲內衣，紋理精緻。場景設定在豪華飯店的浴室，大理石浴缸中瀰漫著蒸氣。光線採用柔和的日式高調光，色調柔和。使用Sony A7R V 相機和 35mm f/1.8 鏡頭拍攝，運用廣角敘事手法。特色：根根分明的髮絲、清晰的眼部對焦、隱形眼鏡陰影、完美的人體結構、高動態範圍、RAW 風格、16:9 寬高比。
避免：人工智慧生成的外觀、塑膠皮膚、低飽和度、多餘的肢體、扭曲的解剖結構、卡通、3D渲染、鬥雞眼、模糊、雜亂的背景、水印、文字、簽名、低解析度、過度銳利化。
en:
GeneGenerate a hyper-realistic 8K cinematic masterpiece photography of a sophisticated woman, elegant oval face, deep mysterious gaze, coral lips. Her physique is slender build, prominent full bust (沉重感), narrow waist, long legs. Skin texture: moist wet skin, droplets reflecting light, dewy finish. She is dressed in stylish lace lingerie set, intricate textures. The setting is Luxury hotel bathroom, marble bathtub, steam haze. Lighting: Soft Japanese airy lighting, high key, pastel tones. Shot with Sony A7R V, 35mm f/1.8, wide angle storytelling. Features: Individual hair strands, sharp focus on eyes, contact shadows, perfect anatomy, high dynamic range, raw photo style, 16:9 aspect ratio.rate an image of a banana wearing a costume.
Avoid: AI-generated look, plastic skin, low saturation, extra limbs, distorted anatomy, cartoon, 3D render, cross-eyed, blurry, messy background, watermark, text, signature, low resolution, over-sharpened.

title: 超現實攝影：日式茶室美女
zh: 【超寫實攝影傑作】描繪一位甜美的年輕女性，擁有精緻的五官，留著黑色長直髮與空氣瀏海。身形呈現身形健美且優雅，擁有平滑的肌膚與自然的身體曲線。皮膚細節：陽光映照出的亮麗膚色，帶有自然光澤與絲絨般質地。她戴著復古黑框眼鏡，散發知性魅力，穿著一件寬鬆超大號的白色男士襯衫，呈現微透視質感。場景設定在在傳統日式茶室中，坐在榻榻米上，背景是禪意花園。光影效果：戲劇性的強烈側光，形成深邃的陰影與強烈對比。拍攝規格：使用 Sony A7R V，搭配 35mm 敘事廣角鏡頭拍攝。畫面特點：細膩髮絲、眼神對焦銳利、真實陰影與高動態範圍。
en: Generate a hyper-realistic 8K cinematic masterpiece photography of a sweet young woman with delicate features, obsidian straight hair, wispy bangs. Her physique is graceful athletic build, smooth skin, natural curves. Skin texture: sun-kissed radiant skin, natural glow, soft velvet texture. She is wearing retro black-framed glasses, intellectual vibe, dressed in loose oversized white men's shirt, semi-transparent. The setting is Traditional Japanese tea room, tatami, zen garden background. Lighting: Dramatic chiaroscuro, strong side lighting, deep shadows. Shot with Sony A7R V, 35mm f/1.8, wide angle storytelling. Features: Individual hair strands, sharp focus on eyes, contact shadows, perfect anatomy, high dynamic range, raw photo style.

title: 大理石浴室中的高冷內衣美女
zh: 【超寫實攝影傑作】描繪一位優雅的時裝模特兒，頸部修長，眼神專注且若有所思。身形呈現身材纖細，上圍豐滿具有份量感，腰身極細，雙腿修長。皮膚細節：濕潤且充滿水感的肌膚，水滴反射著光芒，呈現水靈質感。她穿著一套時尚的蕾絲內衣套裝，擁有精細的織紋細節。場景設定在在高級飯店的浴室裡，坐在大理石浴缸邊，充滿水汽與薄霧感。光影效果：戲劇性的強烈側光，形成深邃的陰影與強烈對比。拍攝規格：使用 Sony A7R V，搭配 35mm 敘事廣角鏡頭拍攝。畫面特點：細膩髮絲、眼神對焦銳利、真實陰影與高動態範圍。

Her physique is slender build, prominent full bust (沉重感), narrow waist, long legs. Skin texture: moist wet skin, droplets reflecting light, dewy finish. She is dressed in stylish lace lingerie set, intricate textures. The setting is Luxury hotel bathroom, marble bathtub, steam haze. Lighting: Dramatic chiaroscuro, strong side lighting, deep shadows. Shot with Sony A7R V, 35mm f/1.8, wide angle storytelling. Features: Individual hair strands, sharp focus on eyes, contact shadows, perfect anatomy, high dynamic range, raw photo style.

title: 2026 新年快樂
zh: 超寫實日系溫泉寫真，清晨暖陽透過障子灑落，溫泉水汽繚繞。一位白皙甜美的女子浸泡在岩風呂中，臉頰帶有泡湯後的自然微紅，眼神溫柔動人，呈現極致的濕潤質感與光影層次。
en: 8K hyper-realistic cinematic photography of a sweet Japanese woman in a traditional indoor hot spring (Onsen). Soft warm lighting through shoji screens, steam haze floating in the air. Natural wet skin with water droplets, rosy cheeks, tender and vulnerable gaze. Shot on Sony A1, 85mm f/1.2 GM, masterful bokeh, raw photo style.

title: 貓耳眨眼特寫
zh: 超寫實日系少女特寫，戴著可愛的白色毛絨貓耳髮箍，俏皮的單眼眨眼表情，清澈的綠色瞳孔與粉嫩妝容，日系空氣感採光。
en: Hyper-realistic close-up portrait of a cute young woman with white fuzzy cat-ear headband. Playful wink, stunning green eyes, soft rosy makeup. Airy Japanese lighting style, highly detailed skin texture.
